name: Rise of the Triad: Dark War
description: I updated this installer for the native Linux version of the game on gog.  I based the update on this: https://forums.lutris.net/t/submitting-a-native-linux-gog-installer/5317
notes: Downloads and runs by default on Ubuntu MATE 19.10, no issues I noticed.

files.goginstaller: N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
exe: Game/start.sh
files:
- goginstaller: 'N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer'
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
